column4: What's the best way of running "cron-like" tasks in ubuntu? I know how to set up Cron, but it doesn't seem like it's being used bu default by the system
use the crontab commands to create the jobs you want and /etc/crontab should be created
sudo -i? Never used that one... care to explain the difference?
there is no 'root' user in ubuntu and sudo -i compensates for the differences between ubuntu & the more standard configuration
